sections.content: 1LAWS OF MALAYSIAREPRINTAct 205PRESUMPTION OF SURVIVORSHIPACT 1950Incorporating all amendments up to 1 January 2006PUBLISHED BYTHE COMMISSIONER OF LAW REVISION, MALAYSIAUNDER THE AUTHORITY OF THE REVISION OF LAWS ACT 1968IN COLLABORATION WITHPERCETAKAN NASIONAL MALAYSIA BHD2006 2PRESUMPTION OF SURVIVORSHIP ACT 1950First enacted............…...1950 (Ordinance No. 16of 1950)Revised ............…...…1978 (Act 205 w.e.f.1 June 1978)PREVIOUS REPRINTFirst Reprint...............2001 3LAWS OF MALAYSIAAct 205PRESUMPTION OF SURVIVORSHIP ACT 1950ARRANGEMENT OF SECTIONSSection1.Short title2.Presumption of survivorship in regard to claim to property Laws of MalaysiaACT 2054 5LAWS OF MALAYSIAAct 205PRESUMPTION OF SURVIVORSHIP ACT 1950An Act to provide for presumption of survivorship in regard toclaims to property.[Peninsular Malaysia—23 May 1950;Sabah and Sarawak—25 February 1965]Short title1.This Act may be cited as the Presumption of Survivorship Act1950.Presumption of survivorship in regard to claim to property2.In all cases where two or more persons die in circumstancesrendering it uncertain which of them survived the other or others,such deaths shall (subject to any order of the court) for all purposesaffecting the title to property be presumed to have occured in orderof seniority and accordingly the younger shall be deemed to havesurvived the elder.
